data.meta_description: Learn about George Segal on AppleÂ TV. Browse shows and movies that include George Segal, such as Love and other drugs, The Bridge at Remagen and more.
data.text:
In Which Dell Finds His Fight

The Oceanside wellness centre takes on the fertility of one of its previous couples, Addison is conflicted about her status in the dating world and Cooper begins a secret affair.

No More Drama

Vince and Turtle decide to arm themselves after a break-in, Drama tries to repair his tarnished relationship with a network executive, and Eric has a conflict while on his first day at his new job.

Murphy's Lie

Eric tries to get back in Ashley's good books while contemplating the job offer, Ari is tested when Mrs Klein appears at work, and Drama attempts to shield Jamie-Lynn from a disreputable TV executive.

Fore!

Vince and Drama join Mark Wahlberg and Tom Brady for a charity golf tournament. Meanwhile, trouble looms for Ari when he lands in hot water with his wife.
